long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The “AuthX Vault” extension is a password manager that offers secure and convenient features for managing your passwords and logging into both enterprise and personal applications. Here are some key features of the AuthX Vault extension:

•	Auto login to your Enterprise and personal apps with just one click!
•	Manage your own applications.
•	Access your AuthX user dashboard applications.
•	AuthX Vault is built with No-Knowledge security architecture where are the data in cloud is fully encrypted and only accessible by you.
•	AuthX Vault provides additional layer of security with Multi Factor Authentication for your sensitive data with various options of biometrics, mobile and one-time passcodes. 
•	Protection with AES 256-Bit encryption.
•	Store unlimited password records in your secure, encrypted vault
Sign up for a free account on AuthX to configure your plugin. 
Need Help reach out to us on help@authx.com
